title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Beat eggs with cheese and pepper.
Drain spaghetti, mix with pancetta, then quickly stir in egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Cook onion and tomatoes, add masala paste.
Add grilled chicken and cream, simmer.
